meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irretrievable.
meanings.sent1: The irretrievabilities of lost memories haunt him.
meanings.sent2: The irretrievabilities of ancient artifacts make archaeology challenging.
meanings.sent3: The irretrievabilities of misplaced keys always lead to a frantic search.
meanings.sent4: The irretrievabilities of time slipping away weigh heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The irretrievabilities of missed opportunities serve as a reminder to seize the moment.

meanings.definition: The inability to be recovered or restored.
meanings.sent1: She felt the irretrievabilities of her lost phone deeply.
meanings.sent2: The irretrievabilities of a broken vase saddened the owner.
meanings.sent3: The irretrievabilities of a deleted file can be frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The irretrievabilities of a shattered dream can be heartbreaking.
meanings.sent5: The irretrievabilities of a lost chance can teach valuable lessons.
